divs: sighting detailsi was sitting in my room looking out my window when i had noticed this object had been in the same spot for at least ten minutes of me first noticing it. i remember thinking it was an approaching airplane at first, but when i looked back again in a few minutes, it was in the same spot. i went to get my binoculars (10x42) and went outside to look. when i looked through them , i could see the outer edge of this circular\disc shaped object was glowing green while the inner part was more of a reddish\golden color. i watched the object for about 10-15 seconds. after it not moving, i went to get my mother from inside to look. when we came out, the object was still in the same spot hovering in the sky. i could see airplanes flying under and around the sky of the object. it never moved and a few times it seemed to blink its light. the whole object would disappear in an instant and reappear again just as fast. i couldn't even see it in the binoculars. there were no clouds in front of it but behind it, that's how i could tell it was inside the atmosphere. it was a huge circular\disc shaped object. even in the binoculars, at that distance, it was much bigger than an airplane. it was silent, didn't move, and glowed... i had never seen anything like it before. after about 20 mins of me seeing it, it just disappeared.
Summary: This object behaved like nothing I've seen before.
trends: There have been 5 other sightings in Weston
There were no other sightings in Weston on or around April 15th 2010
